entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm over northern sections. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Flurries over northern sections in the morning. Snow level rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 4 cm over northern sections. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Flurries over northern sections in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Snow level 1300 metres. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
